message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a system for building an instructible agent that can be taught to execute tasks expressed as natural language commands. This involves solving the problem of building a virtual assistant that can be taught new tasks in any domain by its end users. The paper also discusses the usability study conducted to evaluate the proposed system. Based on this, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Other possible sub-categories include cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval), as the paper involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques.
